game.name: Adam and Eve Cut the Ropes
game.description:
Here we have come up with a brand new arcade game from the most played series: Adam and Eve! This time Adam is not on his way towards saving her girlfriend. But, this time, he needs your help for himself. Suddenly, he finds himself trapped in snake-ropes. Your objective in Adam and Eve: Cut the Ropes is to him get him out. Hope you will give him your helping hand! Join this free online physics puzzle game to help Adam reach to the Eva while grabbing apples!

This cool HTML5 arcade game features 60 levels that are full of amazing fun and adventure. Make sure to cut the ropes at the right time to complete each level and move to the advanced one. You will interact with different obstacles like objects or dangerous people in this popular point and click game series. His beloved Eve is waiting for him. So, cut several hopes holding the friendly prehistoric characters. Make a strategy to plan which ropes you need to cut first to grab all three apples you see on the screen.

It is also your responsibility to make sure that the apples you cut will directly land right at the place where Eve is waiting for them. Donâ€™t hesitate in making a little swing to the ropes to reach the objectives in this cool HTML5 game! His wife is a little bit worried about him and has a huge hope from your side. So, do fast and try to show your helping hand fast to save him from the traps. Good luck to help the romantic caveman to deal with all the challenging obstacles with ease! Check out more physics games at our website to have more fun!
